reviewText: This is the greatest holiday movie in the history of the world.
We must have watched this dozens of times in a loop in the background all holiday season.  It is amazing!

I found this while looking for standard yule log for a party background and thought it was weird enough that we had to show it. I didn't realize it was an actual striptease down to the pasties! Not really the vibe I was going for. It was bizarre all around, amusing for 5 mins but not really worth paying for.
Was recommended by friend but my husband and I couldn't get through it fast enough even with fast forward.  Boring.

I brought this to a holiday party and WHAT A HIT. Everyone loved it! Especially someone's dad that was there and couldn't stop watching the twirling of the tassels, hehe. This is such a fun DVD to have playing in the background. Goodbye boring Yule long, and hello Go-Go burlesque!
Burlesque is hot!  These ladies are all tasteful and my husband just loved this Christmas present!  Burlesque reminds us ladies that beauty comes in the freedom of all shapes and sizes.
